SQL.LOAD_HISTORY: select crih.cert_registered_item_id, crih.cert_registered_item_hist_id, crih.serial_number, crih.item_description, crih.retail_price, crih.purchased_date, crih.purchase_price, (case crih.manufacturer_id when null then crih.manufacturer else (select m.description from elp_manufacturer m where m.manufacturer_id=crih.manufacturer_id) end) make , crih.model, elita.GetDescriptionFromItemextcode(crih.item_status,:language_id) item_status, crih.registered_item_name, elita.GetDescriptionFromListItem(crih.device_type_id,:language_id) device_type, crih.hist_modified_date, crih.modified_date, crih.registration_date, crih.retail_price, crih.indixid, case when crih.item_status = 'ITEM_REGISTRATION_STATUS-I' then nvl(crih.expiration_date,nvl(crih.modified_date,crih.created_date)) when crih.item_status = 'ITEM_REGISTRATION_STATUS-A' then null end as expiration_date from elp_cert_registered_item_hist crih inner join elita.elp_cert_item ci on ci.cert_item_id = crih.cert_item_id where crih.cert_registered_item_id=:cert_registered_item_id order by crih.modified_date desc
